mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_tbl USING dual ON (user_id = #{user_id} AND pro_num = #{pro_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_code, pro_num, user_id, cart_amount) VALUES (seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL, #{pro_num}, #{user_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.cart_code, c.cart_amount, p.pro_num, p.pro_img, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_price, p.pro_name FROM cart_tbl c INNER JOIN product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.user_id = #{user_id}
